title: Report: iPad deliveries can take over two months as Apple focuses on iPhone production
content:
Last week, 9to5Mac covered that ahead of Apple’s earnings report, the company was still suffering from supply constraints. Now, a new report corroborates that Apple has been prioritizing iPhone deliveries over iPads.

more…

The post Report: iPad deliveries can take over two months as Apple focuses on iPhone production appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A report corroborates that Apple has been prioritizing iPhone deliveries over iPads, as getting a company's tablet can take up to nine weeks.
